version_description:
Re-added in-game music
Performance enhancements
Updated sounds for Time Trial
Fixed rotation flicker display glitch
Added new levels

iOS 9 compatibility and this version still works on iOS 8!

New Canyon mode - fly at speed through canyons avoiding the walls. Watch out for the rocks and of course for some odd reason someone has placed walls with narrow gaps throughout just for fun!

iOS 11 support
iPhone X embracing
Fixes to the calibration mechanism
Fixed some glitches with Time Trial mode
Editor object and deletion handling improvements
Other bug fixes
